scene_description_enriched: An elderly man with a long white beard and wearing a blue cloak over a brown tunic kneels on the ground, holding a scroll. Facing him, a winged figure in a golden robe, likely an angel, also kneels and extends its hands towards the man. Behind them, a brick building with two diamond-paned windows is visible. The scene is set against a red, patterned wall on the left and a green ground.
